features.title: Shopping Cart System
features.description: Introduced new Shopping Cart system for personal shops with enhanced functionality.

features.title: All Animals Available
features.description: All animals available for purchase for 1k gems. Requires membership and 10 diamonds (Server sided checks).

features.title: Multiple Instances Toggle
features.description: Add new toggle 'allow multiple instances' in Settings -> Advanced -> Danger Zone. This will cause bugs, errors and issues so please don't flood help channels with the errors that occur.

improvements.title: Improved Exit Modal
improvements.description: Improved exit modal for game client with better functionality and user experience.

improvements.title: Enhanced Shortcuts
improvements.description: Made all in-game shortcuts to also require shift for better control and reduced accidental triggers.

fixes.title: Auto Wheel Stuck Fix
fixes.description: Fix Auto wheel getting stuck on one account found by @h1yok3.

fixes.title: Color Theming Fixes
fixes.description: Fix Color theming for Exit modal, Wheel, and import accounts for lighter colors.

fixes.title: Typo Fix
fixes.description: Fixed typo 'Private message sytem' to 'Private message system'.

messages.title: Multiple Instances Warning
messages.description: The multiple instances toggle will cause bugs, errors and issues. Please don't flood help channels with errors that occur when using this feature.

features.title: New Updates Modal System
features.description: Added comprehensive updates popup since not everyone reads the announcements in full.

features.title: Enhanced Buddies List Management
features.description: Added shift/ctrl + click to buddies list for easy cleaning. Note: this may lag on larger lists - go to your den for better performance.

features.title: Semi-Auto Wheel Spinner
features.description: Added Semi-Auto wheel spinner in login screen settings for all accounts in account manager. Features adjustable delay with 5-minute pause after batch completion to prevent rate limits.

features.title: Account Import Function
features.description: Added import accounts button in login screen settings to easily import username:password combinations into the account manager.

features.title: AJ Classic Integration Enhanced
features.description: Improved AJ Classic integration in main client for seamless launching experience.

features.title: Private Chat System Update
features.description: Implemented @DrEmoji's private chat update with enhanced functionality. Old 3.3.1 swf remains available for non-tinted bubble chat compatibility.

improvements.title: Enhanced TFD Efficient Mode
improvements.description: TFD Automation Efficient mode now collects other crystals while waiting for 13:00, allowing for additional rewards and better resource utilization.

improvements.title: Background Processing Enhancement
improvements.description: Enhanced 'enable background processing' setting on login screen. Now enabled by default and significantly improves automation performance when minimized.

improvements.title: Smart Shop Item Detection
improvements.description: Attempted to add logic to hide items if they already exist in other shops, reducing duplicate listings and improving shop efficiency.

improvements.title: Comprehensive UI/UX Overhaul
improvements.description: Extensive UI/UX enhancements across the entire application for improved user experience and modern design patterns.

improvements.title: Enhanced Instance Protection
improvements.description: Improved prevention of multiple Strawberry Jam instances with better detection and user feedback to reduce support requests.

improvements.title: Robust Installation System
improvements.description: Enhanced installation setup with improved validation to prevent users from installing in incorrect locations and reduce setup issues.

fixes.title: TFD Settings Persistence
fixes.description: Fixed TFD Automation settings not saving properly when changed, ensuring all configurations persist between sessions.

fixes.title: Settings UI Cursor Conflict
fixes.description: Resolved conflict between settings button and game cursor that was causing interface issues.

fixes.title: Network Port Resolution
fixes.description: Comprehensive fix for port 443/8080 issues that many users were experiencing. Improved automatic port detection and fallback mechanisms.

fixes.title: Den Item Purchasing System
fixes.description: Fixed bulk den item purchasing functionality that was causing transaction failures and inventory issues.

fixes.title: Enhanced Exit Handling
fixes.description: Improved game client exit modal functionality. Plugins now properly close when game client exits, preventing socket errors and cleanup issues.

shortcuts.title: Ctrl + X
shortcuts.description: Headless mode - Assists with performance when automating TFD. Requires extensive testing for optimal results.

shortcuts.title: Ctrl + Shift + M
shortcuts.description: Manual cache cleanup functionality for improved performance and troubleshooting. Currently in testing phase.

shortcuts.title: Ctrl + M
shortcuts.description: Quick access to Trade Marketplace through enhanced shortcuts section for faster navigation.

commands.title: 'end' Command
commands.description: Terminates all lingering 'AJ Classic.exe' processes that sometimes remain in the background after game closure.

messages.title: Intelligent Error Messaging
messages.description: Dramatically improved error messages that now provide exact problem descriptions. Users no longer need to ask in help chat - errors tell you exactly what's wrong!

messages.title: Rate Limiting Warning
messages.description: Please be mindful of rate limits when using the Semi-Auto wheel spinner. Account popups before the wheel may affect automation performance.

messages.title: Testing Phase Notice
messages.description: Several features like headless mode and cache cleanup are in testing phases. Please report any issues encountered for continuous improvement.

features.title: Dragonfruit Theme
features.description: Added dragonfruit theme - don't forget to click the strawberry icon on login screen to change theme colors!

features.title: New TFD Automation 'Efficient Mode'
features.description: Better way to automate TFD with efficient gem collection and knowing rewards before opening chests.

features.title: Special Mode Gem Collection
features.description: Collects only green and yellow gems - 8 times more efficient, needs around 40 packets vs 140+.

features.title: Reward Preview
features.description: Knowing reward before opening chest - detect what gifts are coming to see if it's worth waiting till 13:00.

improvements.title: More Efficient Gem Packets
improvements.description: Uses exact gem packets instead of trying all combinations - much more efficient processing.

improvements.title: Smart Sound Notifications
improvements.description: TFD Automation now only makes sound notification if a whitelisted item is found.

improvements.title: Persistent TFD Settings
improvements.description: All TFD Automation settings are now persistent and saved between sessions.

improvements.title: TFD Search Box
improvements.description: Added search box to TFD Automation for easier item finding.

improvements.title: TFD UI Enhancements
improvements.description: Multiple UI enhancements to TFD Automation interface for better user experience.

improvements.title: Pet Sorting Fixed
improvements.description: Pet sorting functionality has been fixed and improved.

improvements.title: Bulk Buy Color Fix
improvements.description: Bulk Buy now purchases the correct color as intended.

fixes.title: Manual Update Settings Fix
fixes.description: Fixed manual updating functionality in settings.

fixes.title: Login Screen Error Improvements
fixes.description: Slight tweaks to login screen errors to be more direct and robust.

fixes.title: Report Problem Enhancement
fixes.description: Upgraded report problem button to include .swf logs and omit sensitive information.

fixes.title: LeakCheck Directory Fix
fixes.description: Fixed output directory button in LeakCheck section of settings.

fixes.title: QuestManager Lag Fix
fixes.description: Modified QuestManager.as to prevent UI stacking causing lag - auto clears adventure, gem stack, and rewards.

shortcuts.title: Ctrl + Shift + N
shortcuts.description: Toggles on/off No Clip (sorta buggy, use to go somewhere then disable).

messages.title: Bug Reporting Guidelines
messages.description: When reporting bugs, please describe what happened, what caused it, and steps to reproduce. Generic reports like 'colors are broken' don't help.

messages.title: Version Switching
messages.description: You can always change to an old working version in Advanced tab by swapping the Production client.

features.title: Item Previewer Revamp
features.description: Added Item previewer revamp by @danny - enhanced item preview functionality.

features.title: Theme Color System
features.description: Click the strawberry icon on login screen OR strawberry in main client to change theme colors - fruit themes available!

features.title: Auto TFD Den & Item Whitelists
features.description: Added den & item whitelists for Auto TFD with specific item and den IDs for better automation control.

features.title: Auto TFD Item/Den Logs
features.description: Added item/den logs to show what items you received/recycled/kept during automation.

improvements.title: Auto TFD Max Retries Setting
improvements.description: Added max retries setting for small disconnects - proceeds with x amount of tries before stopping itself.

improvements.title: Auto TFD Delay Optimization
improvements.description: Removed adjusting delay speed setting as it's pointless and already randomized.

improvements.title: Login Screen UI Improvements
improvements.description: UI & error improvements on login screen for better user experience.

improvements.title: Remember Me Logic Improvements
improvements.description: More revisions to remember me logic to prevent logging in with expired tokens.

fixes.title: Auto TFD Den Recycling Fix
fixes.description: Fixed auto TFD den recycling - was using incorrect %ir% when %dr% packet exists. Fully tested and working.

fixes.title: Installation Directory Fix
fixes.description: Attempted to address issues where Strawberry Jam was downloading to C:\Program Files instead of AppData/Local/Programs.
